page.title: 02BMX NATIONAL BIKE RACE
page.content: { When I arrive at a race venue, we unload the bike and go to be scrutineered. Then I usually have a practice on the race course itself. Sometimes we have to change the gearing on the bike, and my Dad usually does that. Once the bike is set up then we're ready to race. There are normally 8 in a race. We are allocated our start positions in all our 3 races,then we start. We put our front wheels against the start gate, then when the gate is lowered, we are away! To qualify for the semi final, you must do better than 5th. Once in the semi then you must be 4th or better to be in the Final. Positions are again drawn,then the Final is raced. At the moment I am National Champion by 16 points. I should win the U.K. Championships.
